biotools.summary: Projector 2 allows users to map completed portions of the genome sequence of an organism onto the finished (or unfinished) genome of a closely-related species or strain.  Using the related genome sequence as a template can facilitate sequence assembly and the sequencing of the remaining gaps.

bioschemas.name: Projector 2
